list.name: DirtbagDB
list.desc: Field data collection for crowdsourced scientific field data collection.

list.name: Water Data SDK for .NET
list.desc: SDK for pulling data from the USGS NWIS (National Water Information System) and the WQP (Water Quality Data Portal) datasets for use in dotnet applications.

list.name: NWIS ArcGIS Pro Plugin
list.desc: USGS NWIS (National Water Information System) plugin for ArcGIS Pro

list.name: Shoal Creek Water Quality Bio Mitigation Project
list.desc: Project data and exploratory analysis for analysis of swale stormwater controls on the Shoal Creek Watershed in Austin, TX.
